title: The War On Election Integrity Is Heating Up (Ep 1765)
description:
The left is waging war on election integrity and the documentary 2000 Mules. In this episode, I address the astonishing behind the scenes story of the fight to keep you from seeing the truth. 

News Picks:


2000 Mules blew away expectations.

Resurfaced video of pro-mask health expert from 2018 reveals the real reason for mask mandates.

Remote learning likely widened racial, economic achievement gap.

Study suggests email provider bias in sending candidates' emails to spam.


The Reagan blueprint for crushing inflation works. 

The BLM grift continues.
